resources.string: " cycles to sleep. Please go to bed at "

This application can help you to feel rested after your daily sleep. Just choose the time when you want to wake up and touch Calclulate. Applicaiton will calculate the best bed time options, depending on your age and time you spent in bed before sleep.
This application can notify you before your bed time in advance. Please set time in minutes.
Amount of needed sleeping cycles depends on age. Please set your age.
Time that you usually spent in the bed before falling asleep. Average time is about 15 minutes.
Thats time to start getting to bed
